row.process: : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFRASTRUCTURE_MANAGER.PRV.INCLUDE.GET_JOB_STATUS : IF "0" NE STR_FIND(&SUCCESS_STATUS#,&ENV_MGR_JOB_STATUS#) : P "MESSAGE: Job completed successfully." : SET &SUCCESS#=1 : SET &FLAG#=1 : ELSE : IF "0" NE STR_FIND(&FAILURE_STATUS#,&ENV_MGR_JOB_STATUS#) : P "ERROR: Job could not be completed successfully." : SET &SUCCESS#=1 : SET &FLAG#=0 : ENDIF : ENDIF
